value.title: Best kept SECRET in Power BI??? You tell us!
value.excerpt: Have we found the best kept SECRET in Power BI? Adam saw this recently and was BLOWN away! Zooming in can help with presenting in business settings and anywhere else. Here are a few things you can use to make that presentation better with Power BI.  ZoomIt:  https://docs.microsoft.com/sysinternals/downloads/zoomit

value.title: Configure data sources for Power BI Reports in Power BI Report Server
value.excerpt: In this video, I show you how you can configure the data source of a Power BI report within Power BI Report Server. This comes in really handy when you want to get around the Kerberos Constrained Delegation requirements and avoid having to configure kerberos - which can be a pain.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy

value.title: Create a Power BI app registration in 6 steps

This power bi tutorial is needed as we see many questions about the proper configuration for a Power BI app registration regarding which settings to use.  App registrations are needed

value.title: Download and Deploy a K12 Power BI Solution for schools
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shares a Power BI solution he created for K12 schools in United States education. This solution includes instructions to create views for use with the Power BI reports. It also includes a Power BI Desktop template for pre-created reports based on your school data.  GitHub Repo

value.title: Fixing Time Calculations in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows why you may hit some issues with time calculations and how to fix time. He typically sees this when using a Data Warehouse.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Fuzzy match / merging in Power BI Desktop (October 2018)

value.title: Migrate your Paginated reports to Power BI
value.excerpt: Are your paginated reports still on-premises with either Power BI Report Server or SQL Server Reporting Services? Want to move them to Power BI? value.excerpt: The Power BI PowerShell and the Admin API allow you to quickly inventory your organization and manage workspaces and access. value.title: Setting default values using COALESCE in DAX
value.excerpt: Learn how to get default values using the DAX COALESCE function instead of IF statements. A great way to avoid BLANK in Power BI!
